term.title: linear polarizer

item.text: An optical device which allows the transmission of radiation of which the electric vector is restricted to one plane resulting in linearly polarized radiation.

sources.item: PAC, 1984, 56, 231. 'Nomenclature, symbols, units and their usage in spectrochemical analysis-Part VI: molecular luminescence spectroscopy' on page 238 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198456020231)
